name: Alphabeta Asteroids (itch)
description:
Alphabeta Asteroids is an exciting word game with an out of this world space theme! Spell words to remove tiles, causing asteroids to drop. Stars are awarded for dropping asteroids, long words, and bonus play.

In later missions, Comet Bonuses give you the chance to earn 10 times the amount of stars, but you must act fast!  If you do not clear the asteroid within 30 seconds, the asteroid is destroyed and you lose all bonus points!

Collect enough stars to advance to the next mission.  Each mission gets more difficult.

Alphabeta Asteroids contains 40 levels of play… 8 planets, each with 5 missions.
